Quality Education.reason: The course provides education on modern digital skills like programming and AI, and is specifically designed for students with "沒有任何程式經驗" (no programming experience).

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course is fundamentally about a key technological innovation, "區塊鏈" (Blockchain), and its applications, teaching students to build on this new digital infrastructure.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course covers blockchain, a technology with "不易竄改、公開透明等特性" (tamper-proof, transparent characteristics), and "DAO（去中心化自治組織）", which are new models for transparent institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course emphasizes learning through community, teaching students to "深入社群探索" (explore deep into the community) and interact with collectors, fostering partnerships within the Web3 ecosystem.
